name: Green Berryshroom
desc:
[Version 1]

An ordinary-looking mushroom with an extraordinary flavor. Only grows near the orchard at Varesa's house. They're fast growers, so if you see one, eat it quickly.

[Version 2]

Complete Tribal Chronicles: "Collective of Plenty" - Mushroom Realm Mystery

Investigations have revealed these mushrooms to be alter egos of the mushroom god, and, if allowed to grow unchecked, the mushroom god would regain its power. However, as long as people continue to eat them, they will continue to just be very tasty mushrooms.

value.text: Tribal Chronicles: "Field Fungal Traces" - Mushroom Realm Mystery: Act III
